snippet: Mitt Romney came to Wolfeboro, N.H., this year with far more people trailing him, giving residents a preview of what summers could be like if he wins in November.
abstract: Mitt Romney's trip to his summer home in Wolfeboro, New Hampshire, attracts the usual corps of reporters and media followers, giving the quiet town a foretaste of the disruption it can expect should Romney become president.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney came to Wolfeboro, N.H., this year with far more people trailing him, giving residents a preview of what summers could be like if he wins in November.

headline.seo: For Wolfeboro, N.H., It’s Not Just Another Romney Summer
headline.main: For a Vacation Spot, It’s Not Just Another Summer
headline.print_headline: For a Vacation Spot, It’s Not Just Another Summer
